00030 /*************
00031  *
00032  * Name:    qm_qmi_result_tlv_values
00033  *
00034  * Purpose: QMI result TLV Values
00035  *
00036  * Members: (IN) pdevnode    - qcqmi file system device node
00037  *          (IN) pdevkey     - modem device ID
00038  *
00039  * Notes:
00040  *
00041  **************/
00042 struct qm_qmi_result_tlv_values
00043 {
00044     swi_uint32 validresponse;
00045     swi_uint16 result;
00046     swi_uint16 error;
00047 };
00048 
00049 union qm_qmi_tlv_values{
00050     union qm_qmi_dcs_tlv_values qmdcstlvs;
00051     union qm_qmi_fms_tlv_values qmfmstlvs;
00052 };
00053 
00054 /*************
00055  *
00056  * Name:    qm_qmi_response_tlvs_values
00057  *
00058  * Purpose: QMI Response Structure used for building QMI response returned to
00059  *          the user application making the request.
00060  *
00061  * Members: qmiresult   - qmi result tlv
00062  *          tlvvalues   - qmi response parameter tlvs i.e. tlvs after response tlv
00063  *
00064  * Notes:
00065  *
00066  **************/
00067 struct qm_qmi_response_tlvs_values{
00068     struct qm_qmi_result_tlv_values qmiresult;
00069     union  qm_qmi_tlv_values tlvvalues;
00070 };
00071 
00072 /*************
00073  *
00074  * Name:    qmqmisvcresponse
00075  *
00076  * Purpose: QMI Service Response structure.
00077  *
00078  * Members: svc         - QMI service type
00079  *          ctlflgs     - Request = 0, Response = 1, Notification = 2
00080  *          xactionid   - Transaction ID of the last issued QMI service request
00081  *          msgid       - QMI Message ID of the last issued QMI service request
00082  *          amqmimsg    - Storage location for AM response sent from SDK to
00083  *                        application.
00084  *          qmimsglen   - QMI response message length
00085  *
00086  * Notes:
00087  *
00088  **************/
00089 struct qmqmisvcresponse
00090 {
00091     enum eQMIService    svc;
00092     swi_uint8           ctlflgs;
00093     swi_uint16          xactionid;
00094     swi_int8            msgid;
00095     swi_uint8           amqmimsg[1024]; /* should equal AMMAXRESPBKLEN */
00096     swi_uint16          qmimsglen;
00097 };
